meanings.sent1: She resubmits her homework after making corrections.
meanings.sent2: He always resubmits his application for the scholarship.
meanings.sent3: The student resubmits his test with a big smile.
meanings.sent4: The athlete resubmits his record time in every race.
meanings.sent5: The diligent worker resubmits his report for review.

meanings.sent1: The author resubmits his manuscript to the publisher.
meanings.sent2: They resubmit their proposal to the committee for consideration.
meanings.sent3: The chef resubmits his signature dish for the cooking competition.
meanings.sent4: The artist resubmits his painting for the art exhibition.
meanings.sent5: The student resubmits his project for the science fair.
